markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Feyfoul](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1757)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 35</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

To creatures other than fey, the scent of feyfoul seems to be a faint but non-obnoxious odor of cinnamon, but fey find that the stuff interferes with their ability to manipulate a creature's mind. Jubilost invented feyfoul accidentally while he was attempting to create a cologne that would enhance its wearer's appearance to make them seem more otherworldly, but to anyone that asks, the gnome alchemist quickly claims that he'd always intended to create an alchemical tool that provided protection from fey magic.

 A single dose of feyfoul spritzed on a person in the manner of perfume grants the wearer an item bonus to Will saving throws against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects generated by [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) creatures.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Limited"
>
Feyfoul (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 35</row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus, and the duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Limited"
>
Feyfoul (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 35</row>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus, and the duration is 1 hour.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Limited"
>
Feyfoul (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 35</row>

**Price** 750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus, and the duration is 8 hours.
name: Feyfoul
